title: Improve visibility of “Back to dashboard” button in summary view

requirements.text: Update the "Back to dashboard" button in the Yearly Summary view header (in `frontend/src/components/YearlySummaryTable.tsx`) to use a clearly visible, high-contrast style (e.g., a solid background + contrasting text) so it does not blend into the page background.

quotes: Give color the button “Back to dashboard " to make it visible.

acceptanceCriteria: In the Summary view (where `YearlySummaryTable` renders), the "Back to dashboard" button is clearly visible at a glance against the surrounding background.
The button remains readable and distinct in both light and dark mode (no low-contrast outline-on-background appearance).
Clicking the button still returns the user to the dashboard view (no behavior regression).

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose using existing components and Tailwind classes instead).
nonGoals: No changes to backend logic or persistence.
No changes to the button label text (keep it as "Back to dashboard").
No redesign of the summary table layout beyond the button styling.
